snippet: The Danish celebrity chef Claus Meyer is opening a restaurant in La Paz, hoping to start a Bolivian food movement that will rediscover local ingredients.
abstract: La Paz Journal; Danish celebrity chef Claus Meyer is building a restaurant called Gustu  in La Paz, Bolivia, that will be experiment in Andean haute cuisine; he hopes venture will teach Bolivians healthier eating habits, spur economic growth, support local farmers and introduce Bolivian food to the world.
lead_paragraph: The Danish celebrity chef Claus Meyer is opening a restaurant in La Paz, hoping to start a Bolivian food movement that will rediscover local ingredients.

headline.seo: In Bolivia, High Goals and Visions of Haute Cuisine
headline.main: High Ambition and Visions of Andean Haute Cuisine
headline.print_headline: High Ambition and Visions of Andean Haute Cuisine
